Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wright]
Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, England, UK Prizes 1st prize £200, Don Redfern Memorial Trophy and glass plaque. 2nd prize £100, Regional Chairman's Trophy and glass plaque. 3rd prize £75, the Woodbury Trophy and glass plaque. 4th, 5th and 6th glass plaque. Special award Jack Milburn Cup to winning conductor.
